name: The Kyiv-Pechersk Assumption Cathedral
generalDescription: The commemorative coins are dedicated to restoration of the Assumption Cathedral of the Kyiv-Pechersk Lavra monastery, the outstanding historical and cultural monument of Ukraine of the 11th-18th centuries
averseDescription: On the coin obverse within a frame of a baroque ornament decorated with seraphim`s heads there is depicted the Small National Emblem of Ukraine and a four line legend: УКРАЇНА (Ukraine), 5 ГРИВЕНЬ (5 Hryvnia), 1998 (on the German silver coin).
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there are depictions of the Assumption Cathedral, destroyed in 1941, and its ruins as well as the inscription: УСПЕНСКИЙ СОБОР КИЄВО-ПЕРЕРСЬКОЇ ЛАВРИ Х1 СТ. (the Kyiv-Pechersk Assumption Cathedral of the 11th century)
